Package com.telenav.lexakai.annotations

Annotation Type UmlClassDiagram

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) @Repeatable(UmlDiagramRepeater.class) public @interface UmlClassDiagram
Indicates that the annotated type should be included in a UML diagram. For full details, see Lexakai documentation.

Diagram Name

The name of the diagram is derived form the class returned by diagram() by taking the class name and converting it to lowercase hyphenated form. For example, MyDiagram would have the diagram name "my-diagram".

Automatic Method Groups

Method groups can be automatically determined based on heuristic patterns. The automaticMethodGroups() value, which is true by default, determines if methods should be automatically grouped.

Inclusion and Exclusion

Super types and members can be included or excluded with:

  • excludeAllSuperTypes() - All super types will be omitted from the diagram
  • excludeSuperTypes() - The specified super types will be omitted from the diagram
  • includeMembers() - All fields and methods are excluded if this value is false
  • includeOverrides() - Overridden methods are excluded if this value is false
  • includeProtectedMethods() - Protected methods are included if this value is true

Explicit Relations

UML relations can be explicitly defined with @UmlRelation annotation(s) provided by relations(). Relations are explicit when defined in this way, otherwise they may be inferred from member types.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
Lexakai documentation, UmlRelation

  • Element Details

    • diagram

      Class<? extends UmlDiagramIdentifier> diagram
      Returns:
      The name of this diagram

    • automaticMethodGroups

      boolean automaticMethodGroups
      Returns:
      True if methods should be grouped automatically based on guesses about method names
      Default:
      true

    • documentationSections

      String[] documentationSections
      Documentation sections for the annotated type (used in updating the README.md index)
      Default:
      {}

    • excludeAllSuperTypes

      boolean excludeAllSuperTypes
      Returns:
      Super types to exclude from inheritance in this diagram only
      Default:
      false

    • excludeSuperTypes

      Class<?>[] excludeSuperTypes
      Returns:
      Super types to exclude from inheritance in this diagram only
      Default:
      {}

    • includeMembers

      boolean includeMembers
      Returns:
      True if this type should show no members in this diagram
      Default:
      true

    • includeOverrides

      boolean includeOverrides
      Returns:
      True if @Override methods from the annotated type should be included
      Default:
      false

    • includeProtectedMethods

      boolean includeProtectedMethods
      Returns:
      True if protected methods from the annotated type should be included in this diagram
      Default:
      true

    • relations

      UmlRelation[] relations
      Returns:
      Explicit UML relations for this diagram only
      Default:
      {}
